channel.title: :( fml
channel.description: i just died in runescape and lost 10mil. i didnt know what was happenin and i was in a bounty world and got kill, i dont know what bounty is. :( im so angry. i want to quit but i cant, i got 99 skills. ughhh... :'(

item.title: :( fml
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:29, topic:369160”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=465285.msg3405773#msg3405773 date=1290300413]

DANGER: YOU MAY DIE IN THIS WORLD!

pzezima: clicks enter
You are being attacked!
pzezima: Dude wtf hacker! HOW ARE YOU ATTACKING ME! dies WTF I LOST 10m types http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf; creates new thread to qq

dude, if you dont read the danger screen, dont bother crying to us about it

i would rep-- u for that so 168 hours later i can rep ++
[/quote]you can rep-- and rep++ within a minute; it’s doing the same thing twice (rep++ or rep-- two times in a row) that requires the wait time

oh yeah! brb let me do that.
rrr i can only do the rep-- part, i’ll have your 200 asap[/quote]Weird, I’ve done rep-- rep++ before… Oh well, doesn’t matter.

Read full topic
